title: Fresh Step Clean Paws Cat Litter with Febreze Freshness, Advanced Multi Cat Low Tracking Clumping Litter, 37 lbs. (2 x 18.5 lb. Box)
description: Help keep your cat's paws and your home clean with Fresh Step Clean Paws Advanced Multi-Cat Litter. Made using a special blend of larger particles, this low-tracking Fresh Step Clean Paws Cat Litter is designed to stay in the litter box and stick less to your cats fur, minimizing messes. The extra-strength clumping litter formula fights odors on contact and controls odors longer, even in homes with multiple cats (1). The power of Febreze helps neutralize even the strongest litter box smells for 10 days guaranteed (2). Cleaning the kitty litter box is fast and easy with this Fresh Step clumping cat litter that quickly absorbs liquids and forms tight clumps for effortless scooping. This Fresh Step litter has a low-dust formula for cleaner surfaces. Enjoy more catnaps and cuddle time with your kitty when you choose Fresh Step cat litter. (1) Compared to Fresh Step Clean Paws Multi-Cat (2) See package for more information on terms and conditions
